title: Python Scripting \*suggestions
content: I'm new to using [Python](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203172723/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Python) scripting but recently installed 'Font Remix Tools - RMX 1.5' and I'm really impressed with itâ€¦ I was wondering if anyone has any 'must have' Python scripts or any suggestions as I'm not familiar with what's been released.
author: Mike Jarboe

comments.content:
See Karsten Leucke's scripts:  
 [http://kltf.de/kltf\_otproduction.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203172723/http:/kltf.de/kltf_otproduction.htm "http://kltf.de/kltf\_otproduction.htm")

Most of the scripts I use almost every day were written for me by either Karsten or Ben Kiel.

There is a collection of links at:  
 [http://www.fontlab.com/python/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203172723/http:/www.fontlab.com/python/ "http://www.fontlab.com/python/")

I still need to add a few more scripts there which I have become aware of recently, but the Python page on fontlab.com should give you a good start.

Cheers,  
Adam
